title: N172 Scott Stratton Rebacked For Sale
author: TT40391

posts.post_title: N172 Scott Stratton Rebacked For Sale
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I recently picked this card up via ebay from fellow board member Peter.  The card displays great but it appears it was rebacked at one point.  I hate to have to sell it but I over spent for this month and have to let it go.  Scans are below.  

I am asking $300.00 for it.  Feel free to send offers also.  Payment by paypal only.  I will pay for the priority mail shipping with tracking/confirmation.  Message me through the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  

Thanks

Tony

Tony,

Sorry you had to sell the Stratton. Another one will come up again!

Peter
